akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition on certain advertising, sales, and enrollment practices

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Prohibition on Engaging in Substantial Misrepresentation.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) An educational institution with a course or program of education approved under this chapter, and an entity that owns such an educational institution, shall not engage in substantial misrepresentation described in subsection (b).
